keyword: how many calories are in ritz crackers
title: How Many Calories Are in Ritz Crackers?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Ritz crackers per serving of 5, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, fat, protein, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Ritz Crackers?
assumptions: Original Ritz crackers, standard serving of 5 crackers (about 16 g), no toppings or spreads.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and serving size; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A serving of 5 Ritz crackers contains about 80 calories and 1 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp peanut butter per cracker
Top with 1 slice cheddar cheese per cracker

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Ritz cracker?
faqs.a: About 16 calories per single Ritz cracker.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 5 Ritz crackers?
faqs.a: Approximately 10 g of carbohydrates, with 0 g fiber and 1 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are Ritz crackers high in sodium?
faqs.a: A serving of 5 has 140 mg sodium, about 6% of daily value.

faqs.q: How much fat is in Ritz crackers?
faqs.a: 5 crackers provide 4.5 g total fat, including 1 g saturated fat.
Yes, about 1 g protein per serving of 5 crackers.
